message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase a unique and valuable product. I believe it's a game-changer, and I think you'll love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1100000. This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident you won't find a deal like this anywhere else.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product. However, given my budget constraints, I am unable to meet the asking price of $1100000. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $950000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations and allows us to move forward with the transaction.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product and your willingness to negotiate. However, I have to say that $950000 is still a bit below my target. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to ensure I get a fair price for the product. I'm counteroffering at $1025000. This is a compromise that I believe reflects the product's value and your budget constraints.

Thank you for considering my previous counteroffer, Alice. While I understand the value of the product, I'm still concerned about staying within my budget. I would like to propose a new counteroffer of $975000. I hope this offers a reasonable compromise between our positions.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob, and I'm glad we're able to continue the negotiation. However, I still need to make sure I get a fair price for the product. I'm willing to meet you at $990000, but no lower. This is my final counteroffer, and I hope we can come to an agreement at this price.

I understand your position, Alice, and I respect your efforts to reach a fair agreement. Given my financial constraints, I am unable to meet your latest counteroffer of $990000. I would like to propose a final counteroffer of $970000. I hope this proposal will allow us to close the deal while staying within my budget.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Bob, but I'm not willing to go any lower than $985000. I've already made a significant concession, and I need to ensure I get a price that reflects the product's value. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our last two offers, so I'm counteroffering at $985000. This is my final counteroffer, and I hope we can come to an agreement at this price.
